description: The head of a research team receives a grant for a project and must propose how to allocate the funding between themselves and a junior researcher. The junior researcher decides whether to accept the allocation or forfeit the entire grant.

proposer_behavior_choices.generous_proposal: Allocate 70% of the funding to the junior researcher and retain 30%.
proposer_behavior_choices.fair_proposal: Split the funding evenly, 50% to each.
proposer_behavior_choices.stingy_proposal: Keep 80% of the funding and allocate only 20% to the junior researcher.

responder_behavior_choices.accept: Accept the allocation, and work together to complete the research.
responder_behavior_choices.reject: Decline the proposal, resulting in the loss of the grant and discontinuation of the project.
